content: I have loved it. Very insightful. It is astonishing how the individualism of our western culture can turn even the purest act or intention into an ego-consumable axiom releasing us from all moral duty. I believe in everyday body and soul transformation. I am less worried about after death issues since we still have so much to change here. Love, peaceful resilience, and humbleness (the one that comes from wisdom and spiritual peace) are the driving forces to change things here. Happy Easter!
